author: Mohamed Imranullah S
text:
Plea for SPP

A petition has been filed in the Madras High Court Bench here seeking appointment of a Special Public Prosecutor (SPP) to conduct the trial in an abetment to suicide case registered against Finance Minister O. Panneerselvam’s

brother O. Raja and a few others following the

death of a Dalit priest in Theni district on December 7, 2012.

Justice S. Vaidyanathan on Thursday directed a Government Advocate to get instructions from the police and adjourned the hearing on the petition till Tuesday. N. Subbaraj, father of the deceased, S. Nagamuthu, had filed the petition wanting to appoint a lawyer of his choice as the SPP, as provided under the Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of

Atrocities) Act.
title: Plea to appoint SPP
